General.Name: Nu-Med Plus Inc
General.Description: Nu-Med Plus, Inc., a medical device company, engages in the design, development, enhancement, and commercialization of medical devices worldwide. The company develops a hospital nitric oxide delivery system, a clinical nitric oxide delivery system, a mobile rechargeable device to deliver nitric oxide gas, and a nitric oxide system that can be used for research applications. It serves hospitals, health systems, and the medical community. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is based in New York, New York.
General.Address: 455 East 500 South, Salt Lake City, UT, United States, 84111
